9th January 2015
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}
BSKL is delighted to announce that Sports Academies will be starting again this week and early next week. They are for students of certain ages and all abilities who are interested to have further coaching to develop their abilities and knowledge. They will be led by BSKL's specialist PE teachers and coaches. Please click on the below links for further information regarding dates, times, costs and registration links. Please make payments at Primary Finance office prior to the start of the club.
Badminton Basketball Rugby Football Swimming (Reception - Year 3) Swimming (Year 3 - Year 10) Cricket Gymnastics Strength Training Trampolining
Kind Regards,
Harrie Thomson Director of Physical Education and Sport {!Contact.SchoolText__c} World Class Education
